net.sf.freecol.common.io

Class FreeColDataFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.freecol.common.io.FreeColDataFile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FreeColModFile, FreeColSavegameFile

    public class FreeColDataFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Support for reading a FreeCol data file. The data file is either a ZIP-file or a directory containing certain files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FreeColDataFile(java.io.File file)
      Opens the given file for reading.

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFileNames(java.lang.String prefix,
                                                            java.lang.String suffix,
                                                            java.util.Locale locale)
        Gets a list containing the names of all message files to load.
        Parameters:
        prefix - The file name prefix.
        suffix - The file name suffix.
        locale - The Locale to generate file names for.
        Returns:
        A list of candidate file names.

      • getResourceFileNames

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getResourceFileNames()
        Get a list of candidate resource file names for a given locale.
        Returns:
        A list of resource file names.

      • getInputStream

        public java.io.BufferedInputStream getInputStream(java.lang.String filename)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Gets an input stream for the specified resource.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename of a resource within this collection of data. If this object represents a directory then the provided filename should be relative towards the path of the directory. In case of a compressed archive it should be the path within the archive.
        Returns:
        An InputStream to read the resource with.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs

      • getResourceMapping

        public ResourceMapping getResourceMapping()
        Creates a ResourceMapping from the available resource files.
        Returns:
        A ResourceMapping or null there is no resource mapping file.

      • makeFileFilter

        public static java.io.FileFilter makeFileFilter(java.lang.String requiredFile,
                                                java.lang.String... endings)
        Make a FileFilter for a set of file endings.
        Parameters:
        requiredFile - If non-null, the filter will accept a directory containing this file.
        endings - Acceptable file suffixes.
        Returns:
        A suitable FileFilter.

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath()
        Get the path to the underlying file. Useful for error messages.
        Returns:
        The path to the file.
